album.title: 1994-06-22: Check Your Threads: Astoria, London, UK

track.name: Time to Get Ill
comments: An unfortunately titled song in retrospect. RIP MCA
"Lo0kin aT my GUCCI is abT daT Time"
I'm feeling a little ill. I think I'll go lie down.
hell yes to sampling CCR and zep.  i love the beastie boys. :)
It is indeed time to get ill.
lookin' at my gucci, it's about that time... beautiful Schoolly D sample

CCR's Willy And The Poor Boys sample at the end.  And mnkyblls13, when did gender and ethnicity have anything to do with music? Since I was a child I had never judged music racially or by gender because music is universal. Take your bigoted comments elsewhere, it has no place here.
i...i...itz taim to g... to g... to get ILLLLL
